description: AI agents that automate back-office work for trucking (document intake, billing, outbound sales). Grew to $100K ARR in first year; achieved up to 70% MoM customer growth during the early scaling phase.

Spearheaded analytical efforts in the launch of a new product feature adopted by 200K+ customers, developed AI prototypes, and democratized data accessibility for 320+ team members via cost-effective, open-source software.
Scaled a full-fledged, centralized Data team from scratch; planned, executed and socialized data roadmap with business leads; evangelized data-driven culture across the organization.
Delivered robust, scalable, and extensible data products to help increase the coverage of digital video catalog for millions of customers worldwide.

Served as the Tech Lead in the Data organization. Shaped the roadmap for the Data org, and led multiple initiatives that resulted in incremental revenue gain, operational excellence, and infrastructure revamp.

Advanced development of product features in the product roadmap by means of data analytics and experiments, built data products (ETL scripts, dashboards, reports and analysis write-ups) for stakeholders and promoted data-centric culture through effective communication.
Created values for customers through applications of machine learning and data analytics.
